alert.note: Alert for Northern Fulton; Northern Warren; Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 14 at 3:28PM EST until January 15 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON EST SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 30 to 40 mph. * WHERE...Northern Warren, Western Ulster and Northern Fulton Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 7 PM this evening to noon EST Saturday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Sunday evening through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Northern Fulton; Northern Warren; Western Ulster
